reviews.name: Energizer Qi Inductive iPhone 3G/3GS Sleeve
reviews.reviewText: The inductive sleeve makes charing your iPhone very easy. Simply lay the phone on your charger and it automatically charges. No cords, no hooking up. Keep the sleeve on at all times for easy charging.
reviews.title: This sleeve makes charging your iPhone a snap!

reviews.name: Energizer Qi Inductive iPhone 3G/3GS Sleeve
reviews.reviewText: Love that it's a full case, just put your phone it it, and toss it on the charger anytime you need a charge. Makes it a lot easier to charge
reviews.title: Love it!

reviews.name: Energizer Qi Inductive iPhone 3G/3GS Sleeve
reviews.reviewText: Love that the charging case can also be used as an every day iPhone case and that you can charge 2 phones at one time. Definitely a time saver!
reviews.title: Great iPhone Charger!
